alert.note: Alert for Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 3:26PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Flagler, St. Johns, northeastern Putnam and southeastern Duval Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 326 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Mandarin to Andalusia. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Saint Augustine, Crescent City, Hastings, Mandarin, Fruit Cove, Andalusia, Ponte Vedra Beach, East Palatka and World Golf Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
